com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync

Class BlocksData.TotalBlocksEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.BlocksData.TotalBlocksEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStore.NormalData
    Enclosing class:
    BlocksData

    public class BlocksData.TotalBlocksEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataStore.NormalData
    Represents an entry in the PVP data store. It is dynamic, i.e. it can be edited once it has been created.
    Author:
    bitWolfy
